function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Model simulates infection dynamics based on SARS-CoV-2 parameter estimates, without considering age stratification.","Impact":"Incomplete representation of infection dynamics may lead to inaccurate results and ineffective mitigation strategies.","Mitigation":"Incorporate age stratification to accurately represent population demographics and susceptibility to infection.","Technologies":"Modeling software with age-stratified compartments.","People":"Population in the modeled regions, especially those with age-specific health vulnerabilities.","Owner":"Model developers, public health agencies."},{"Description":"Population-level mobility fluxes obtained from Facebook Data for Good may raise privacy and ethical concerns.","Impact":"Potential violation of user privacy and misuse of location data.","Mitigation":"Ensure secure data handling, obtain informed consent, and anonymize location data.","Technologies":"Secure data storage, encryption, and anonymization algorithms.","People":"Facebook users whose data is used for mobility fluxes.","Owner":"Facebook, research institutions using the data."},{"Description":"Health outcomes modeled based on SEIR simulations incorporating demographic information.","Impact":"Inaccurate health outcome predictions leading to inadequate resource allocation and response planning.","Mitigation":"Validate demographic information with reliable population data sources and epidemiological studies.","Technologies":"Health outcome prediction models, population health databases.","People":"Public health authorities, healthcare organizations, and populations in the modeled regions.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies."}]}
